sys_security_acl.description: User can only write/update groups involving themselves
sys_security_acl.name: sn_splitwise_group.*

sys_update_version.name: sys_security_acl_a566b7c47f760210d94a0cd10d866503
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>User can only write/update groups involving themselves</description><local_or_existing>Local</local_or_existing><name>sn_splitwise_group.*</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = false;
var list = current.members? current.members.split(',') : null;
if(list){
	for(var i=0;i<list.length;++i)
	{
		if(list[i]==gs.getUserID())
		{
			answer = true;
			break;
		}
	}
}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-10 15:17:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>a566b7c47f760210d94a0cd10d866503</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sn_splitwise_group.*</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Splitwise" source="sn_splitwise">a8747a317f220210d94a0cd10d86659d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Splitwise">a8747a317f220210d94a0cd10d86659d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_a566b7c47f760210d94a0cd10d866503</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-18 09:59:55</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
